name: Vroom Vroom (David Flórez Herrero, Posly, Raysoul, Made-N-H3AVEN, Krystyna Cesarz, Pierre MARIOTTE, ajeanselme, Zeldruck, Mecha20)
name_original: Vroom Vroom (David Flórez Herrero, Posly, Raysoul, Made-N-H3AVEN, Krystyna Cesarz, Pierre MARIOTTE, ajeanselme, Zeldruck, Mecha20)
description:
Have you ever played a turn based racing game? Have a breath of nostalgia with our new gem: VROOM VROOM! Take control of a spring car and try to make the most of your turn in crazy maps and 3D environment. Dodge the obstacles and moving objects, watch your friends play and predict the most optimal path to take!

Vroom Vroom is a 3D, 4-player versus turn-based racing game where your goal is to travel the most distance during the game.

Controls :
